sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react" import "./generator.scss" const Generator = (props:{setBlur:any, setTransparency:any, blur:any, transparency:any})=>{ const [blur, setBlur] = useState(10); const [transparency, setTransparency] = useState(50); const blurHandle=(e:any)=>{ props.setBlur(e.target.value) } const transHandle=(e:any)=>{ props.setTransparency(e.target.value) } return(
background: rgba( 255, 255, 255, {props.transparency/100} );
box-shadow: 0 8px 32px 0 rgba( 31, 38, 135, 0.37 );
backdrop-filter: blur( {props.blur} );
-webkit-backdrop-filter: blur( {props.blur} );
border-radius: 10px;
border: 1px solid rgba( 255, 255, 255, 0.18 );
) } export default Generator
